improvements.feature: Fixed collapse badge click detection
improvements.description: Increased hit area to 15px and ensured collapse detection happens before drag threshold, preventing conflicts with drag-to-move functionality

improvements.feature: Implemented full copy/paste/duplicate system
improvements.description: Added complete clipboard operations with subtree support, including copySelected(), cutSelected(), pasteFromClipboard(), duplicateSelected(), selectAll(), and deleteSelectedNodes(). Supports Ctrl+C/X/V/D/A keyboard shortcuts. Preserves entire tree structure with proper ID regeneration.

improvements.feature: Added viewport indicator to minimap
improvements.description: Implemented blue rectangle overlay on minimap showing exactly what portion of the tree is currently visible in the main canvas. Includes semi-transparent fill and adaptive stroke width. Helps with navigation in large trees by providing spatial awareness.

improvements.feature: Implemented multi-select with Shift+Click
improvements.description: Added professional multi-select functionality using Shift+Click. Primary selection shows solid blue border, secondary selections show dashed blue border. Added 'Selected' counter to status bar. Multi-selected nodes are highlighted on minimap. Status messages provide clear feedback on selection changes. Supports toggling selections by Shift+clicking already-selected nodes.

improvements.feature: Added right-click context menu
improvements.description: Implemented professional context menu with Copy, Cut, Paste, Duplicate, Delete, and Select All operations. Menu items dynamically enable/disable based on current state (selection/clipboard). Shows keyboard shortcuts for discoverability. Positioned at cursor with proper styling matching VSCode theme. Closes when clicking outside or selecting an action.

improvements.feature: Created keyboard shortcuts reference panel
improvements.description: Added comprehensive keyboard shortcuts modal accessible via F1. Displays all available shortcuts organized by category (File, Edit, View, Tree Operations, Help). Styled with professional kbd elements that look like physical keyboard keys. Two-column grid layout for easy scanning. Scrollable for mobile/small screens.

improvements.feature: Fixed copy/paste/duplicate/delete to work with multi-select
improvements.description: CRITICAL BUG FIX: All clipboard operations (copy, cut, paste, duplicate) were only working with single selectedNode instead of selectedNodes Set. Fixed all functions to properly handle multi-select. Copy/paste now supports copying/pasting multiple nodes at once. Duplicate creates offset copies of all selected nodes. Cut properly copies before deleting. Delete works with all selected nodes.

improvements.feature: Fixed minimap navigation coordinate transformation
improvements.description: Corrected coordinate transformation in minimap click handler to accurately map minimap coordinates to canvas coordinates. Now clicking on the minimap properly centers the viewport on the clicked location. Fixed scaling and offset calculations to account for canvas pan and zoom state.

improvements.feature: Improved zoomFit with safety checks and better padding
improvements.description: Enhanced zoomFit() function with comprehensive safety checks to prevent divide-by-zero errors when tree bounds are empty. Added better padding calculation (20% margin around tree bounds). Implemented scale clamping to prevent extreme zoom levels (0.1x to 10x range). Ensures smooth and safe zoom-to-fit behavior even with edge cases.

improvements.feature: Enhanced connection curves with adaptive bezier control
improvements.description: Improved connection line rendering with adaptive bezier control points that adjust based on node separation distance. Added subtle drop shadows to connections for depth perception. Control points now scale proportionally to distance between nodes, creating more natural curves for both short and long connections. Enhances visual hierarchy and readability of tree structure.

improvements.feature: Added professional node styling with gradients and 3D highlights
improvements.description: Implemented sophisticated node styling with vertical gradients (lighter at top, darker at bottom) for a subtle 3D effect. Added highlight strips at the top of each node for depth perception. Enhanced border styling with appropriate colors for different node states (selected, collapsed, normal). Maintains professional appearance while improving visual clarity and hierarchy.

improvements.feature: Added node search functionality with search box in toolbar
improvements.description: Implemented comprehensive search functionality that searches across node name, type, and config properties. Added search input field to main toolbar with magnifying glass icon. Search is case-insensitive and supports partial matches. Provides clear status feedback showing number of matches found.

improvements.feature: Search results highlighted with pulsing yellow/gold border
improvements.description: Enhanced search UX by highlighting matching nodes with animated pulsing border that transitions between yellow and gold. Makes search results immediately visible and easy to identify in large trees. Animation draws attention without being distracting.

improvements.feature: Auto-centers on single search result
improvements.description: Improved search behavior to automatically center viewport on node when search returns exactly one match. Provides instant navigation to searched node without manual panning. Enhances single-node lookup workflow.

improvements.feature: Fixed autoLayout to auto-call zoomFit after positioning nodes
improvements.description: Enhanced autoLayout function to automatically call zoomFit() after positioning nodes, ensuring the entire tree is visible after layout operation. Eliminates need for manual zoom adjustment after auto-layout. Improves workflow consistency.

improvements.feature: Added Ctrl+F shortcut to focus search box
improvements.description: Implemented standard Ctrl+F keyboard shortcut to instantly focus the search input field. Follows universal convention for find functionality. Enhances keyboard-driven workflow by allowing quick access to search without mouse interaction.

improvements.feature: Fixed canvas dimensions dynamically match container
improvements.description: CRITICAL BUG FIX: Canvas had hardcoded dimensions (4000x3000) but was displayed in smaller flex container. This caused ALL viewport calculations (fit, minimap, search navigation) to use wrong canvas.width/height values, making them pan to incorrect locations. Added resizeCanvas() function that dynamically sets canvas dimensions to match container on load and window resize. This single fix resolves all reported viewport bugs.

improvements.feature: Enhanced collapse badge with 30px hit area and hover cursor
improvements.description: Increased collapse badge hit area from 20px to 30px radius (almost 3x visual size) with explicit drag state clearing. Added pointer cursor on hover for discoverability. Hit area now extends well beyond visual badge making it much easier to click reliably.

improvements.feature: Fixed autoLayout with immediate render and better feedback
improvements.description: Added immediate render() call after layout positioning so users see the layout change. Improved error messages ('No nodes to layout', 'âš  No root node found'). Reduced setTimeout delay from 100ms to 50ms for faster response.

improvements.feature: Implemented drag-to-connect with visual feedback
improvements.description: Major usability improvement: drag any node onto another node to create parent-child connection. Automatically validates: node can accept children, respects maxChildren limit, prevents cycles, checks if child's subtree contains potential parent. Shows green glow with strong shadow (borderWidth: 5, shadowBlur: 20) on valid drop targets during drag. Creates connection on drop with status confirmation.

improvements.feature: Double-click to rename nodes inline
improvements.description: Quick inline rename: double-click any node to edit name directly on canvas. Creates temporary input overlay at click position with current name selected. Enter saves, Escape cancels, blur saves. Input styled to match editor theme (VSCode dark). Updates undo history and properties panel. Much faster than opening properties panel.
